title: Creating Artists With Units
description: In this lab, you will learn how to create artists with units in Matplotlib. You will create different types of artists, such as a line, text, and patch, and add them to a plot. You will also set the units for the x and y axes, and learn how to convert units to scalars.

meta.title: Creating Artists With Units in Matplotlib
meta.description: Learn how to create different types of artists, set units for axes, and convert units to scalars in this Matplotlib programming tutorial.
meta.keywords: python playground, matplotlib, units, artists, python, data visualization, programming
